ygData.msgSnippet: well i like the rathe...there s jerks everywhere you go, that s unavoidable.....but to me, rathe is home (: doesn t seem to be alot of ks ing where i hunt, on
ygData.messageBody:
well i like the rathe...there's jerks everywhere you go, that's unavoidable.....but
to me, rathe is home (: doesn't seem to be alot of ks'ing where i hunt, on any of my
chars, but it does happen on any server...that's a given

(\/)ystix

EvertorN wrote:

> From: EvertorN <evertorn@...>
>
> Hi all. I decided this would be a good place to put this, since everyone has
> good input on our class, while others refuse to help one another, I dunno.
> Basically I currently play on veeshan server, and for months have been fed up
> with it. Now I've heard other ppl say (and could be rumors) that there is less
> ks'ing on other servers, as well as not a dominate god guild like foh on the
> server. (to Those of you possibly in FOH on this list, no offense, the group of
> friends I play with (UWS) as well as I have had bad run ins with your guild.
> Basically FoH and UWS has gone there...let's not do it again in here)
>
> So basically my question to you is the server you play on how do you like it?
> I'm seriously considereing abandoning all my characters on Veeshan to play on a
> better server. This game is all about the playability in the environment, which
> veeshan seriously limits those not powerhungry play the game.
>
> Evertorn Soul
> Level 20 Erudite Cleric on Veeshan
>
